text: Petr Pokorný (April 21, 1933 – January 18, 2020) was a Protestant theologian. He was a professor at Charles University in Prague, and pastor of the Evangelical Church of Czech Brethren. He was one of the leading biblical scholars in the Czech Republic. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Czech writers Category:Christian theologians
title: Petr Pokorný (theologian)
